attributes.title: ⚠️WARNING THIS APP HAS A VIRUS⚠️
attributes.review: ⚠️DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT IS A VIRUS!!⚠️As soon as you open the app it hacks your phone and steals all your bank information! It has stolen information from me and several of my friends! I believe gen-Z made this fake Trump app to steal our information! attributes.title: Sucked
attributes.review: This is literally the worst app nothing works and all the info was fake I had to try and try just to get it open then I had to redownload it multiple times the adds where also the worst some of the parts didn’t work and lead to third party apps

attributes.title: Worst app ever!
attributes.review: Made my phone glitch out so bad and had to go get it fixed. I couldn’t even be on my phone for 10 seconds before it would freeze up. Not to mention an annoying buzzing noise kept coming out of my phone every time it was glitching.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see my daily Trump news and it completely drained by battery! I would start at 100% and after 30 minutes my phone dies! I also saw that the app glitches way too much. I hated my experience with this app and will never be downloading this again😡

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: This app is horrible, it took almost 2 hours to download and when I opened it my phone exploded so I proceeded to throw my phone and it landed next to my cat, my cat bursted in flames and died, my whole house ended up smiling like roasted chicken. I’m truly horrified by this, now I have to go to therapy because of this terrible app💔

attributes.title: This app almost killed me 🤡🤡🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🤬😡
attributes.review: So I I downloaded the app it took like 40 years to download but when it was ready I went to check it out and my phone exploded and it started saying rate us 5 stars I’m currently at the hospital with my face all ripped people need to see my story so for that reason I rate it a 1🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬😤😡😡

attributes.title: We are scarred for life because of this
attributes.review: this is the worst app i have ever downloaded. while it was downloading it installed corona virus onto my phone and proceeded to have rats jump out of my phone and shove the corona virus up my nose and started dancing around my dead grandma. when i tried to delete the app my phone burst into flames

attributes.title: awful app🟠✨
attributes.review: this app is just the worse. it lagged so badly, probably because of an orange man it did, but then again there could be so much more apps that are BETTER than this app just taking up space in this store and still completely lagging. if i could rate it 0/10 i would.

attributes.title: Absolutely not you orange🍊

attributes.title: Worst app

Then when i was on the app picture of a rat kept coming up it was disgusting and the rat look kinda orange. Anyways I really don’t recommend it I will have nightmares for a long time .
